Summary: A fan of the Broadway musical Wicked is seeking advice on which DVD or digital version to purchase, looking for the best option with bonus features at an affordable price.

The digital release of the Wicked movie, starring Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande, is set for January 3, 2025, in the UK and December 31, 2024, in the US, with bonus features and deleted scenes included.

The musical film will be available for digital purchase and rental by the end of 2024, followed by a physical release, including 4K Blu-ray, on February 4, 2025, with bonus content and deleted scenes.
A musical film will be available for digital purchase and rental by the end of 2024 and physically released on February 4, including a sing-along version, bonus content, and deleted scenes.
